dcterms:description: A compendium of high-quality local late-type galaxies used to learn a prior from empirical observations of galaxies, which have resolved structures suitable for approximating high-resolution galaxy light profiles.
dcterms:title: PROBES

dcterms:creator: P. Camps
M. Baes
dcterms:description: A large public collection of images spanning 0.3-5 microns made by applying dust radiative transfer post-processing to galaxies from the TNG cosmological magneto-hydrodynamical simulations.
dcterms:title: SKIRT TNG

dcterms:description: The COSMOS survey provides a comprehensive overview of cosmic evolution, offering deep imaging data that allows for the study of galaxy morphology and evolution over cosmic time.
dcterms:title: COSMOS
